subject: French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Chang, who upset Ivan Lendl in the fourth round of the 1989 French Open when he was 17, is at Roland Garros on a new mission, as coach of the Japanese star Kei Nishikori.
snippet: Chang, who upset Ivan Lendl in the fourth round of the 1989 French Open when he was 17, is at Roland Garros on a new mission, as coach of the Japanese star Kei Nishikori.
